DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate immunological memory induce 4 dos GSK Biologicals ' 11valent pneumococcal vaccine ; study antibody persistence 30 month 4 dose vaccination GSK Biologicals ' 11-valent pneumococcal vaccine Undeca-Pn-010 study .
DOC.brief_title: Study Immunological Memory Induced Children Full 4 Dose Vaccination Schedule 11 Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Giving 1 Dose Aventis Pasteur 's 23-valent Pneumococcal Polysaccharide Vaccine ( Pneumo 23 )
DOC.detailed_description: Primed group : 50 subject previously receive 4 dos GSK Biologicals ' 11Pn-PD vaccine receive 1 dose Pneumo 23 Unprimed group ( Control ) : 50 subject receive GSK Biologicals ' Havrixâ„¢ vaccine receive 1 dose Pneumo 23
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female participate UndecaPn010 study , part blood subset receive 4 dos GSK Biologicals ' 11PnPD vaccine , Havrix vaccine . Exclusion criterion : Use investigational nonregistered drug vaccine study vaccine within 30 day preceeding first dose study vaccine , plan use study period . Administration additional pneumococcal vaccine since study end UndecaPn010 ( 347414/010 )
